[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@dual-lab/meta-commander](./meta-commander.md) &gt; [OptionConfig](./meta-commander.optionconfig.md) &gt; [shortName](./meta-commander.optionconfig.shortname.md)

## OptionConfig.shortName property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The short option character. if not specified it will be inferred from the first letter of field or method name. To suppress short name put equal to `false`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
shortName?: string | false;
```

## Remarks

Can be suppressed only if the `longName` is not.

## Example 1


```typescript

@MetaCommand
class MyCli {
 @MetaOption({
   shortName: 'd'
 })
 debug?: boolean;
}


```

## Example 2


```bash
my-cli -d


```
